message.text: Welcome! Thank you for helping revolutionize CMU and bring accesibility to the blind!

You will be placing beacons. Go to the Supply Station
and grab a beacon. Find the Beacon Location
using the number on the back, and place the beacon on the wall about 10 feet off the ground.
Tell me when youâ€™re done!
